How to become our partner?

The whole process of concluding the partnership is simple and can be as short as two weeks or less. You need to offer activities as described in the categories above to become our partner. Also, you have to meet some basic conditions.

We will, of course, sign a contract together that sets the rules of the game.

How to become our partner?

The whole process of concluding the partnership is simple and can be as short as two weeks or less. You need to offer activities as described in the categories above to become our partner. Also, you have to meet some basic conditions.

We will, of course, sign a contract together that sets the rules of the game.

Why work with us?

  • Flexible cooperation

    Lorem ipsum MultiSport is a single card that gives your employees everyday access to 900+ sports facilities

    It doesn’t end with the contract signing. We care for our clients during the entire cooperation period.

    They get more effective, and it creates a pleasant workplace atmosphere.

    Common activities strengthen interpersonal relationships, build trust and teach the art of cooperation.

Frequently asked questions

We work with more than 900 facilities throughout Bulgaria. Our dedicated team works hard to select and provide you with the best quality gyms, swimming pools, fitness classes and other sporting amenities. The full list of sports facilities you can find on our Locations page.
